meanings.definition: A person skilled in the preparation of food.
meanings.sent1: The culinarians at the restaurant create delicious dishes every day.
meanings.sent2: Culinarians often work in busy kitchens to prepare meals for customers.
meanings.sent3: The culinarians decided to have a cook-off to see who could make the best dessert.
meanings.sent4: In the culinary world, culinarians are the artists who turn ingredients into masterpieces.
meanings.sent5: The culinarians' passion for food shines through in every dish they serve.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to cooking or the kitchen.
meanings.sent1: The culinary school offers courses in various culinarians techniques.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant's culinarians staff ensures that every dish meets high standards.
meanings.sent3: The culinarians competition was fierce as each chef tried to outdo the other.
meanings.sent4: Her love for all things culinary made her the perfect fit for the culinarians club.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked bread filled the kitchen, a true culinarians delight.
